articles.content: We already know that KTM India is working on the updated RC range of motorcycles. And, previously we saw a test mule of the next-gen RC 200 doing rounds on the roads. Now the latest spy image of the … [+2280 chars]

articles.title: DLF To Buy Stake In Commercial Project In Gurugram For Rs 780 Crore - BloombergQuint
articles.description: DLF’s rental arm has entered into a pact to acquire the stake of U.S.-based Hines  in a premium commercial project in Gurugram.
